meanings.definition: In a watchful or alert manner
meanings.sent1: She looked around vigilantly to make sure no one was following her.
meanings.sent2: The security guard patrolled the premises vigilantly throughout the night.
meanings.sent3: The cat sat vigilantly by the window, ready to pounce on any unsuspecting bird.
meanings.sent4: The lighthouse stood vigilantly on the cliff, guiding ships safely through the night.
meanings.sent5: The old dog watched vigilantly as the children played in the yard, always ready to protect them.

meanings.definition: With close attention to potential danger or threats
meanings.sent1: The detective listened vigilantly for any sounds of movement in the dark alley.
meanings.sent2: The hiker scanned the trail vigilantly for any signs of wildlife.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel vigilantly guarded its stash of nuts from other sneaky critters.
meanings.sent4: The soldier stood vigilantly at his post, scanning the horizon for any signs of enemy movement.
meanings.sent5: The teacher watched vigilantly as the students took their exams, making sure there was no cheating.
